articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert Given on Victory Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Concert Given on Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a concert given by the State Merited Chorus on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Warmly acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the audience, he heartily congratulated them on the day of victory in the war.
					
					Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as male choruses "Song Devoted to Marshal
						 Kim Il Sung", "Our General Is the Best" and "July 27, Our Victory Day", serial wartime songs "Song of National Defence", "To the Road of Decisive Battle" and "My Song in the Trench", orchestral music and male chorus "Mungyong Pass", male chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?", male solos and male choruses "We Defend Safety of General" and "For My Only Motherland", male chorus "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "The Victorious Parade".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the shining feats the KPA and the people performed by crushing the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country under the wise guidance of the Party and the leader and thereby demonstrating the dignity and stamina of heroic Korea before the whole world and fully represented the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They, at the same time, powerfully demonstrated the will of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu to mercilessly wipe out the U.S. imperialists and their stooges hell-bent on the moves to ignite a new war by the force of arms of Songun bolstered up and defend the socialist country as firm as an iron wall if they dare intrude into even an inch of the inviolable sky, land and seas of the DPRK.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the State Merited Chorus gave a splendid concert rich in ideological contents and high in artistry replete with the faith and will of the DPRK and the revolutionary soldier spirit, Kim Jong Il highly estimated the successful performance and extended thanks to all the creators and artistes.
					
					 The historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was an event of national history which saved again the destiny of the country from the crossroads of life and death and a shining victory which proved in reality that no force on earth can bar the Korean people from advancing toward independence, sovereignty and socialism, he said, adding that the feats President Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war against the U.S. will last forever with the annals of the country.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the artistes of the State Merited Chorus would positively encourage the army and people of the DPRK to win a new victory through their revolutionary and militant performing activities just as they inspired soldiers to perform feats on the heights where battles were fought despite the rain of shells and powder smoke during the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kuk Thae and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Ju Sang Song, member of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of People's Security, commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs and leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President
					 Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victory won by the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, those of the Korean People's Interior Forces, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill.
					
					Seen standing before the statue was a floral basket sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before the statue in the name of party, armed forces and power organs and social organizations and ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army, those of the Korean People's Interior Forces, institutions at different levels here, industrial establishments, farms, schools and others.
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statue in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the President in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets were laid before the statues at Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of People's Security, the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace and in other places.
					
					 Working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country placed floral baskets, bunches of flowers and flowers before statues of the President in their residential areas.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs and Memorial Tower
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs and Memorial Tower
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid on the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets placed before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Tuesday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands were wreaths sent by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the ceremonies were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, KPA service persons and those of the Korean People's Interior Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet were laid on the stands of the cemeteries and a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK and the Central Military Commission of the WPK placed before the main sculpture Victory of the tower.
					
					 Also laid on the cemeteries and the memorial tower were wreaths and floral baskets in the name of armed forces organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units and those of the Korean People's Interior Forces and scientific, educational, public health and media institutions, party and power organs, industrial establishments, farms and schools in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to martyrs.
					
					 Military attaches corps here also laid wreaths and floral baskets on the cemeteries and before the tower.
					
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and paid silent tribute to her.
					
					 Meanwhile, wreaths were placed before statues of martyrs, the Monuments to Fallen Fighters of the KPA and graves of martyrs in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Concert Given
articles.content:
Concert Given
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A concert was given by artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe and the State Symphony Orchestra to celebrate the day of the victory won by the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Tuesday on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					 Among the audience were senior state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations,  ministries, national institutions and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and those of the Korean People's Interior Forces, working people in the city, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of different countries and military attaches of foreign embassies here and representatives of international bodies here and foreign guests.
					
					 The performers in the orchestral music "Song Devoted to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Our Victory-Day July 27" and other numbers highly praised the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory with his Juche-based military idea, war methods,  outstanding strategy and experienced commanding art and thereby shattering the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history and demonstrating the dignity and honor of the country and the nation before the whole world.
					
					 They also put on the stage numbers vividly representing the indomitable spirit and feats of the servicepersons of the People's Army and people who dedicated their youth and lives to the motherland without hesitation and courageously struggled to boost the wartime production and assist those on the front.
					
					 Orchestral music "Our General Is Best", mixed quartet "Let's Have Toast", chorus "Give Us Order,"etc. helped  the audience harden their faith and will that the day of victory-- July 27 will shine forever as long as the DPRK is led by Kim Jong Il, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience as it was permeated with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of defending the country and the stamina of heroic Korea that prevailed in the country in the 1950s.  
					
					 Colorful art performances also took place in Pyongyang and local areas on the same day.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on Tuesday to celebrate the 57th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Such venues of dancing parties as plazas before the April 25 House of Culture, the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium were alive with youth and students who gathered with the joy at celebrating the day.
					
					 They presented dances to the tune of songs, looking back on the immortal exploits President
						 Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory with his Juche-oriented military idea, war methods, outstanding strategy and commanding art, thus fully demonstrating the dignity of the country and the nation and setting a world example in the anti-imperialist revolutionary wars.
					
					 They enthusiastically danced full of conviction that only victory and glory are in store for the army and people of the DPRK making the exploits performed by him in the war shine forever true to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The atmosphere at the dancing parties picked up when the melodies of songs "Ours is the Song of Victory" and "Nilliri of Songun" reverberated far and wide.
					
					 The venues were permeated with the firm determination of members of the young vanguard to mercilessly wipe out the enemies to protect the honor of Songun Korea if the aggressors pounce upon them just as the young people did during the war.
					
					 On the same day, similar events took place in various parts of the country including Phyongsong, Kanggye, Hamhung and Wonsan.

articles.title: War Museum Visited by Many People
articles.content:
War Museum Visited by Many People
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- More than half a century has passed since the Korean people won the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950 - July 27, 1953).
					On the occasion of the anniversary of the victory in the war, July 27, an increasing number of people have visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the banks of the River Pothong in Pyongyang.
					
					 The museum, which opened in August 17, Juche 42 (1953), has some 80 exhibition halls, including those of a general review, the anti-Japanese armed struggle, democratic revolution, military operations, services and arms, heroes of the Republic, struggle of people in the rear, great victory,  large panorama of the Taejon liberation operation.
					
					 They house many revolutionary relics, photos, large relief maps, mementoes, etc. showing the greatness of President Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander, imperishable feats he performed in the war, and heroic fight of the Korean army and people to inflict an ignominious defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressors who started the war to stifle the DPRK in its cradle.
					
					 Over the past 57 years a total of 29,650,000 people, including servicepersons, schoolchildren, overseas Koreans and foreigners, have visited the museum.

articles.title: Myth of America's "Mightiness" Broken in Korean War
articles.content:
Myth of America's "Mightiness" Broken in Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean War (June 1950-July 1953) was a disgraceful war for the U.S. imperialists because it exploded the myth of their "mightiness" and started them on the downhill.
					 At that time many people of the world were thinking that there was no power to match with the United States on the globe and that a country could achieve democracy, freedom and sovereignty only with its "assistance".
					
					 In the Korean War, however, the "superpower" suffered an unprecedentedly serious defeat, military, political and moral, though it mobilized all sorts of up-to-date combat equipment in the war. 
					
					 MacArthur, who was posing as Napoleon in the east, Ridgway, Clark, Walker and other generals who had distinguished themselves in many wars of aggression took part in the Korean War but all of them drank a bitter cup.
					
					 An advance group of the 24th Division of the U.S. Army was crushed down in Osan, contrary to its expectation that the north Korean army would disperse upon hearing the news of its joining in the war, and the division, which had boasted of being "invincible", was annihilated in Taejon, 
					
					 A large number of U.S. guns, tanks, planes and warships became victims of the superb war methods of the Korean People's Army on the land and seas and in the sky.
					
					 U.S. soldiers, fearful of death, fled from battlefields, laid down their arms collectively or refused to act as ordered, deploring the war.
					
					 The ignominious defeat the U.S. suffered in Korea from its young army was the first of its kind in America's 100-odd-year-long history of aggression wars.
					
					 The then U.S. secretary of Defense, Marshall, confessed that the myth was broken and that the United States was not such powerful a country as others thought.
					
					The defeat of the U.S. imperialists in the Korean War was a punishment inflicted by the Korean army and people, led by Kim Il Sung, a great strategist and ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander, upon the aggressors. It put an end to the myth of their "invincibility."

articles.title: Papers Celebrate Victory Day
articles.content:
Papers Celebrate Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Papers Tuesday editorially call for eternally glorifying Songun Korea's ever-victorious history on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the victory in the war was a shining one won thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and the ideological and moral power of all the servicepersons and people who formed a community in which they were united with the leader by the same destiny. He is a mainstay of their faith and a symbol of victory, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The victorious history of the country which has remained shining generation after generation is a history of great victory of the Songun idea, the Songun revolutionary line of the Workers' Party of Korea, a history of victory of the great army-people unity that has grown strong under the leadership of the WPK and a history of victory of the strong faith in independence and the transparent working class principle of all the servicepersons and people.
					
					 The Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided political and military guarantees for glorifying the ever-victorious history generation after generation and encouraged them to perform heroic feats of the century to shine in the struggle to defend socialism and build a thriving nation.
					
					 The paper calls on the whole party and army and all the people to emerge victorious in the drive for building a thriving nation just as they won the last war, holding higher the banner of Songun, and greet the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK and its conference with great innovations and leap forward.
					
					 Minju Joson notes that a very rosy future awaits the DPRK which advances holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem. It calls on everybody to make the ever-victorious history and tradition shine forever and dynamically struggle to build a thriving nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean War Maneuvers Slashed
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean War Maneuvers Slashed
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group kicked off the largest-ever joint naval exercises to invade the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea on July 25 with ultra-modern war hardware such as nuclear-powered aircraft carrier involved, talking about the "demonstration of deterrent to contain north Korea and armed forces."
					 They are contemplating frantically staging exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK in the sea, air and ground till the end of this year one after another including the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises slated to be waged in mid-August.
					
					 In the meantime, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group held what they called "talks of diplomatic and defense chiefs" in Seoul when their plot to cook up a "resolution on additional sanctions against the DPRK" went bust. At these talks they hatched a new plot against the DPRK and, on this basis, discussed on what they called "plans for separate sanctions" and a war scenario in a bid to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement issued on Tuesday condemned this action as another serious provocation to the DPRK and a blatant challenge to the peace-loving public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 All the movements of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces go to prove that a final examination of Washington's scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK has been over in the diplomatic and military aspects and is set to enter the phase of actual actions. 
					
					 They plugged the Japanese reactionaries into the anti-DPRK smear campaign and the racket for confrontation with the DPRK in a bid to tighten the military nexus among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 They are translating the plan to create a "triangular military alliance" into reality by inviting even Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" to participate in the on-going joint naval exercises under the cloak of "observers."
					
					 All facts go to prove with added clarity that the case of the sunk warship of the south Korean puppet navy is a hideous conspiratorial farce orchestrated by the U.S. in an effort to stifle the DPRK, invent a pretext for launching a war of aggression against the DPRK, bolster up the force to dominate Northeast Asia and knock into shape a military "alliance" for aggression.
					
					 If they ignite a war in any waters of the East Sea or the West Sea of Korea, this war will spill over not only into the Korean Peninsula but into the rest of Northeast Asia and rapidly develop into a new global war.
					
					 It is the spirit and mettle of the DPRK to react to "force" in kind and foil sanctions in kind.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will decisively react to the enemies' "demonstration of deterrent" with more powerful and horrible deterrence built up by dint of Songun as already clarified.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group would be well advised to stop their reckless acts, well aware that their stand-off with the DPRK and war moves will bring them nothing but disgrace and a miserable defeat.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and Lao FM
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and Lao FM
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Talks between Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, and Thongloun Sisoulth, vice-prime minister of the government of Laos and foreign minister, were held in Laos on July 26.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were the party of the foreign minister and the DPRK ambassador to Laos and from the Lao side officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Laos.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of the situation in their countries and exchanged views on the issue of boosting the bilateral friendly relations and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Rev. Han Sang Ryol Tours Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Rev. Han Sang Ryol Tours Mt. Paektu Area
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, pro-reunification champion of south Korea, toured the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					He visited General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu and went round the historic relics, being briefed on the fact that he grew, hearing the gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war as a lullaby.
					
					 Han posed for a picture in front of the birthplace. 
					
					 He climbed Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 From the top of the mountain he commanded a bird's- eye view of the majestic appearance of the holy mountain, the exciting landscape of the shores of Lake Chon and many mountain ranges reminiscent of the blood vessel of the nation.
					
					 He made the rounds of the Samjiyon Grand Monument, the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area, Sajabong secret camp, the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site, the Mupho camping area, the Chongbong Bivouac Ground, the Pegaebong Guerilla Camp, the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, etc.
					
					 He visited the Paektu Museum, the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace, the Changphyong Farm in Taehongdan County, the Taehongdan Potato Processing Factory, etc. and met with working people in Samjiyon County.
					
					 In the meantime, Han visited the Sinchon Museum, Changdok School, etc. and met with members of the Media Panel and the Literature and Art Panel of the North Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Camping Begins at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Camping Begins at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A ceremony took place at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Tuesday to receive the 25th batch of campers.
					  Present there were Kil Chol Hyok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and officials concerned and groups of campers from China, Russia, Tanzania and the DPRK.
					
					  The campers laid a floral basket and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the camp and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A congratulatory address and a report were delivered and then followed speeches at the ceremony.
					
					 During the camping, they will harden themselves physically and deepen the bonds of friendship through colorful activities including maritime physical culture, amusement games and "day of nation".

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Wonsan
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Wonsan
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The performance of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, began in Wonsan of Kangwon Province Tuesday.
					 Among the audience were officials of party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the province.
					
					The audience was excited to watch the light comedy as it was created and staged in Kangwon Province early in the 1960s, bringing great pleasure to President Kim Il Sung, and reproduced under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The light comedy mesmerized the audience as it helped them renew their determination to bring about the "echo of mountain" in the on-going general offensive to improve the standard of people's living just as this echo stirred up the people in the era of Chollima. 
					
					 At the end of the performance, the audience evinced their resolution to make a positive contribution to making Kangwon Province take the lead in the worthwhile drive to build a Juche-oriented thriving nation under the Songun leadership of the party just as the preceding generations built socialism on this land, true to the noble intention of the President.
					
					  The performance goes on.

articles.title: US.-S. Korea Joint Maneuvers under Fire
articles.content:
US.-S. Korea Joint Maneuvers under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet war-like forces finally kicked off large-scale joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea.  
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The on-going exercises are unpardonable criminal acts  to disturb the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK as they are the largest-ever in the history of naval military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet group finally kicked off this saber-rattling despite the fact that the conspiratorial nature of the warship case was brought to broad daylight. This indicates that they are utterly indifferent to the calls of the domestic and foreign public and the presidential statement of the UNSC for preventing military conflicts on the Korean Peninsula and seeking peaceful negotiated settlement of all problems. 
					
					What matters is that the exercises are not confined to a mere "demonstration of forces." The trigger-happy elements are contemplating staging more than 10 joint military exercises such as Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises and anti-sub drill in a sustainable manner till the end of this year in the wake of the on-going joint naval drills. By staging plays with fire for invading the DPRK through the all-the-year-round beef up of aggressor forces they seek to push the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war. Their ulterior intention is to recover from their ignominious diplomatic defeat at the UN by posing a military threat to the DPRK and justify their moves to escalate the confrontation with it. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group will keenly realize before long what a dear price they will have to pay for their reckless military provocations.

articles.title: Establishment of Peace-Keeping Regime Called for
articles.content:
Establishment of Peace-Keeping Regime Called for
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Such conspiratorial farce as the "Cheonan" case put the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. to the worst phase and drove the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war in a moment. It is the basic way of bringing this grave situation under control to replace the outdated Armistice Agreement by a new peace treaty as early as possible so as to establish a lasting peace-keeping regime on the peninsula.  Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 After orchestrating such farce as the "Cheonan" case the U.S. kicked off large-scale joint military maneuvers targeted against the DPRK under that pretext, leading the situation to an extreme phase, the commentary notes, adding that this is aimed at putting the whole of Korea under its control by means of war and using the peninsula as a military springboard for launching Asian aggression.
					
					 Due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK its nuclear threat to the peninsula has further increased, far from decreasing, the commentary notes, and goes on: In order to bring the process of denuclearization of the peninsula back on its orbit it is necessary to pay primary attention to building confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., the principal parties concerned with the nuclear issue, and to this end it is essential to put an end to the state of armistice, the root cause of the hostile relations between the two countries, and conclude a peace treaty to begin with. 
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to make a decision to replace the AA which exists in name only with a peace treaty. If the U.S. truly stands for settling the issue of the peninsula, it will not be hard for it to conclude a peace treaty and the denuclearization process will make rapid progress.
					
					 Everything depends on the stand and attitude of the U.S.
					
					 It should not evade its heavy responsibility as the arch criminal that strained the situation on the peninsula and sparked off a nuclear crisis but respond to the DPRK's just call for replacing the AA with a peace treaty as early as possible. 
					
					 Doing so is beneficial not only to the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world but to the U.S.

articles.title: Firm Adherence to Songun Politics Called for
articles.content:
Firm Adherence to Songun Politics Called for
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea serves as the most powerful political mode reliably protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and creditably guaranteeing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is entirely thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has won one victory after another in the stand-off with the U.S. for more than half a century.
					
					 Songun is the mode of making a revolution consistently maintained by the President in the whole course of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has invariably pursued the policy of attaching importance to army and military affairs since long ago true to the Songun idea and line of the President, thus developing the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK into an invincible army. 
					
					 It is under the leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a military power which no aggressor forces dare provoke and an impregnable fortress reliably protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the nation. That is why all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas are confident of national reunification and a rosy future of a thriving nation full of high national pride and honor. 
					
					 It is clearly proved by the present reality that the peace on the Korean Peninsula and security of the nation are guaranteed thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 The history of victory will last forever as long as the Songun politics is in force.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will decisively shatter the madcap moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers to invade the DPRK and dynamically carve out the independent destiny of the nation by dint of Songun in the future, too, as they have covered a glorious course of victory, weathering out stern storm and stress and performing historic miracles under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations denounced the Lee Myung Bak group for its frantic suppression under the pretext of security.
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in its statement on July 20 accused the "Security Investigation Group" under the Taegu District Police Agency of forcibly searching the house of O Thaek Jin, general secretary of the Taegu and North Kyongsang Provincial Federation of Pomminryon, on July 19 on charge of violation of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The statement also condemned the fascist authorities for taking such repressive actions as closing the internet homepage of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and issuing again warrants for arrest of Choe Yong Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Committee for Independent Reunification of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, and Jong Tae Yon, former chairman for Policies of the solidarity.
					
					 Chiding the Lee group for steadily getting frantic with its anachronistic crackdown, not yet coming to its senses after suffering a heavy defeat in the "elections to local self-governing bodies", the statement called upon broad strata of people to wage dynamic actions to check and foil the Lee group's fascist suppression.
					
					 The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in its statement on July 23 accused the Supreme Court of taking such fascist actions as sentencing to two years in jail Kim Song Il, a member of the organization, after labeling it an "enemy-benefiting organization." 
					
					 The Solidarity is active for implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, reconciliation and cooperation between the south and the north and reunification, the statement said, declaring that the above-said label attached to the organization amounts to an anti- reunification act perpetrated on charge of violation of the NSL, an outdated evil law.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Drop Unpopular Labor Policy
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Drop Unpopular Labor Policy
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party and other opposition parties and civic and public organizations in south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on July 23 strongly demanded the puppet authorities roll back their unpopular policy.
					 They denounced the present regime for frantically intensifying the suppression of the labor movement by invoking "the Law on Trade Unions" which had been retrogressively revised in a brigandish manner and persistently pursuing unpopular policies.
					
					 They held that the above-said evil law should be rewritten as it calls for limiting and reducing the time and scope of activities of full-time union leaders and banning even the workers' union movement.
					
					 Branding the Lee Myung Bak regime's actions to stamp out trade unions as a challenge to the people desirous of democratization, they declared they would give vent to the resentment of the people in the "by-election to the National Assembly" slated to take place on July 28.

articles.title: US.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
US.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The "Joint Action for Probe into the Truth about Warship 'Cheonan' Case and Peace on the Korean Peninsula" of south Korea grouping at least 40 civic and public organizations including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification held a rally in Seoul on July 25 at which they denounced the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for their madcap joint naval exercises.
					 At the rally speakers condemned the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime for finally kicking off joint naval exercises in the East Sea of Korea with huge armed forces involved though the international public denied the "story about the north's" involvement in the case of warship "Cheonan" and called for defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The war maneuvers precisely mean a real war, they noted, adding that the escalated military confrontation on the peninsula is threatening peace and the vital rights of all the people in the south and the north.
					
					 Whoever wants peace should turn out in the struggle against the warmongers' ambition for aggression and war in order to bar them from plunging the peninsula into flames of another war, they stressed.
					
					 They stated they would stage joint actions including rally, press conference and demonstration across south Korea throughout the period when the above-said joint naval exercises are under way.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Thailand
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Thailand
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the Juche idea took place at Rajabat Pranakorn University on July 15 under the sponsorship of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand.
					 Present there were Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the above-said organization, members of the Juche idea study organization in Bangkok and teachers and students of the above-mentioned university.
					
					 Speeches were made at the seminar under the titles "The founding of the Juche idea", "The view on the world clarified by the Juche idea and the essential nature of man", "The development in depth of the Juche idea by HE Kim Jong Il,""Juche idea and the Songun politics of the DPRK", etc.

articles.title: Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for
articles.content:
Conclusion of Peace Treaty Called for
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Ahmed Hamrush, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, issued a statement on July 20 in support of the Korean people's just cause.
					 The Korean War that broke out in 1950 ended up signing the Armistice Agreement in 1953, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The AA has not been replaced with a peace treaty and still remains a leftover of the Cold War.
					
					 Korea still remains divided despite the desire of all the Koreans and tens of thousands of U.S. forces are present in south Korea.
					
					 This poses constant threat to the peace in the region.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak's seizure of power in south Korea deteriorated the inter-Korean relations though they had favorably developed since the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the recent case of sunk warship "Cheonan," in particular, created such tense situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out any moment.
					
					 The AAPSO holds that a peace treaty should be concluded between the DPRK and the U.S. so that it may contribute to the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The countries concerned with the issue of the Korean Peninsula should join efforts to achieve Korea's reunification in favor of peace in the region.

articles.title: Korean Victory Day Observed
articles.content:
Korean Victory Day Observed
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Shapril Arsiyad, chairman of the Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions, released a statement on July 21 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 July 27 was a day when the Korean people emerged victors by shattering the myth about the "mightiness" of the U.S. in the war, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK won a shining victory in the last Korean War thanks to the outstanding strategy and Juche-based war methods of President Kim Il Sung and the Korean people's heroic self-sacrificing spirit.
					
					 The Korean people not only honorably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country but foiled the U.S. attempt to dominate the world and safeguarded global peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. has zealously shielded and instigated the south Korean puppet clique to cook up the case of warship "Cheonan" and link it with the DPRK, rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense.
					
					 We are convinced that if the U.S. provokes another war against the DPRK, the Korean people under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il will surely defeat the U.S. and achieve the country's reunification.

articles.title: Ofrendas y cestos de flores ante cementerios y monumento a Victoria
articles.content:
Ofrendas y cestos de flores ante cementerios y monumento a victoria
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 57o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fueron depositados el dia 27 las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el Cementerio de Patriotas y los cestos de flores ante el Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Estaban colocadas ante ambos cementerios las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Dirigente
						 Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC del Ejercito del Interior Popular de Corea y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron depositados ante los cementerios las ofrendas florales a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, y un cesto de flores a nombre comun del CC y la Comision Militar Central del PTC ante la escultura "Victoria", tema principal del referido monumento.
					
					En seguida, fueron colocados las ofrendas y cestos de flores a nombre de los organismos de las Fuerzas Armadas, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del Ejercito del Interior Popular de Corea, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los organismos del partido y el Poder, las fabricas, las empresas, las granjas y las escuelas en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires
					
					El Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea deposito la ofrenda y el cesto de flores ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, respectivamente.
					
					Los agregados militares guardaron un momento de silencio tras poner ramos de flores ante el busto de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar las ceremonias de homenaje tambien ante las estatuas de bronce de los martires, los monumentos a los martires del EPC y las tumbas de estos en distintas partes del pais.

articles.title: RPDC respondera con disuasivo mas fuerte a los enemigos, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
RPDC respondera con disuasivo mas fuerte a los enemigos, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ATCC) -- Ahora, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan a partir del dia 25 en el Mar Este de Corea un ejercicio maritimo conjunto nunca visto movilizando el portaaviones nuclear y otros equipos de guerra ultramodernos bajo el rotulo de "ostentar el disuasivo contra el Norte" y hacer "manifestacion militar". 
					Ademas, planean realizar a mediados de agosto que viene el ejercicio conjunto militar "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y desplegar freneticamente hasta finales del ano en curso otros simulacros belicos anti-RPDC en el mar, el cielo y la tierra. 
					
					Por otra parte, al ver fracasada su farsa de aprobar en la ONU un "proyecto de resolucion de sancion contra el Norte", convocaron en Seul las "conversaciones de ministros de Relaciones Exteriores y de Defensa Nacional" donde trazaron un nuevo complot anti-RPDC, y a base de ello, se entregan con mas frenesi a la campana de confrontacion con esta hablando de la "sancion unilateral" y del plan de ejercicios belicos. 
					
					El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), en su declaracion fechada 27, lo califico de una grave provocacion a la RPDC y un desafio brutal a la opinion publica interna y externa amante de la paz.
					
					Todos los movimientos de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos muestran que el plan de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC ya paso la revision final tanto en lo diplomatico como en lo militar y entra en la practica, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos incorporan a los reaccionarios japoneses a la intriga y enfrentamiento anti-RPDC, fortaleciendo la colaboracion militar entre si mismos y hacen a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon participar en el presente ejercicio maritimo conjunto bajo el rotulo de "hacer visita", de manera que se dirigen a la realizacion de la "alianza militar tripartita".
					
					Todos los hechos comprueban mas claramente que el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" es un complot de gran tamano inventado con el fin de aplastar a la RPDC y preparar el pretexto de la guerra de agresion contra esta, mantener y ampliar la capacidad dominante de EE.UU. en el Noreste Asiatico y establecer la "alianza" militar de caracter agresivo. 
					
					Una chispa de provocacion que den EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos en cualquier parte de las aguas maritimas de la Peninsula Coreana, sea el Mar Este o el Mar Oeste, se extendera a toda la extension de la Peninsula Coreana y del Noreste Asiatico, y se convertira en un instante en una nueva guerra.
					
					Responder a la "fuerza" con la fuerza y a la "sancion" con la sancion, esto es el temperamento y coraje de la RPDC.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, como ya habian expuesto, responderan a la "manifestacion de disuasivo" de los enemigos con el disuasivo mas fuerte consolidado con el Songun.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia, dandose clara cuenta de que la confrontacion anti-RPDC y las maniobras belicas les daran solo la verguenza y la amarga derrota.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Laos
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Laos
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 en Laos las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, y su homologo Thongloun Sisoulth, vicepremier del gobierno de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana la comitiva del canciller y el embajador en Laos, y por la otra, los funcionarios del MINREX.
					
					 Ambas partes se informaron de la situacion de sus respectivos paises e intercambiaron criterios sobre el problema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Iniciado campismo en Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon
articles.content:
Iniciado campismo en Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 la ceremonia inaugural del 25o campismo del Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon.
					En el acto participaron Kil Chol Hyok, secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios correspondientes y los grupos de los campistas de China, Rusia, Tanzania y Corea.
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras colocar un cesto y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el campamento.
					
					En la ceremonia hubo discurso de felicitacion, informe e intervenciones.
					
					Durante la temporada, los campistas practicaran deportes maritimos, los juegos recreativos y otras actividades como la celebracion del "Dia Nacional" para forjarse en lo fisico y profundizaran el sentimiento de amistad.
